affiliation._instruction: Add the current and, if necessary, past affiliations of this organization.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add one or several globally unique and persistent digital identifier for this organization.

fullName._instruction: Enter the full name of the organization.

hasParent._instruction: Add a parent organization to this organization.

homepage._instruction: Add the uniform resource locator (URL) to the homepage of this organization.

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this organization that could be used as a shortened title for visualization in cases where there is only little space for display.
